channel.title: Security Onion Solutions
channel.description: Recent content on Security Onion Solutions

item.title: Onsite Training
item.description:
We are currently offering a 4-day class that covers the following topics:

Installation
Configuration
Analyzing Alerts
Hunting
Standalone Sensors
Distributed Deployments
Administration
Tuning
Incident Response
Case Studies

Have 8 or more students and want a local class within the continental United States? Please send an email to onsitetraining@securityonionsolutions.com to discuss further.

item.title: Online Training
item.description:
We also have 3-hour online training sessions:
Security Onion 101 - Introduction to Security Onion
Security Onion 201 - Best Practices for Standalone Production Sensors
Security Onion 202 - Case Studies
Security Onion 301 - Best Practices for Distributed Deployments

These 3-hour online sessions are offered multiple times throughout the year via GotoTraining. Please click the following link to see the upcoming sessions:
https://attendee.gototraining.com/9z73w/catalog/8119062504158470144

If you have questions about online training, please send an email to: onlinetraining@securityonionsolutions.com

item.title: Professional Services
item.description: Building a new Security Onion deployment? Need help with your existing Security Onion deployment? We offer several professional services options. Please send an email to professionalservices@securityonionsolutions.com and let us know exactly what kind of help you’re looking for.
